resources.string: Fast, safe, and the choice for millions of users
Due to potential risks with the application version in use, please download the official application from our official site.
Authorization request failed. Please try again later.
Authorization request timed out. Please try again later.
Authorization request failed! Please try again later.
To ensure account security, we strongly suggest you enable the Security Code.
We will send a verification code to the bound mail address ${1}. Remember to check it before it expires!
Before entering the game, you must first agree to the User Agreement and Privacy Policy.

To make improvements to our services and ensure a high-quality gaming experience, we may share your personal data with our partners, provided you give consent. The information will be used for game logins, enhancing game features, improving the user experience, personalizing advertisements, and assessing and optimizing advertisements.
To ensure your rights are fully protected, please read and agree to the following agreement and data permission statement. Then tap Agree to proceed into the game.
You may modify the above agreement and data permission settings via ${1}.
To ensure your rights are fully protected, please read and agree to the following Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Then tap Agree to proceed into the game.

Sorry, you declined authorization, and cannot enter the game. Please give us the permission to access your device in order to generate or retrieve game account information, as well as permission for storage on your device to read game data.

Please authorize us to access your device so as to create a unique ID for your game account and allow our customer service team to find your lost account quickly. You will not be able to enter the game without completing this authorization. Thank you.
"You won't be able to log into our game since you've declined. To ensure the game runs properly, we need your permission to read and write files on your device. Head over to the settings now?"
Sent to ${1}. Tap on the link in the email to complete verification.
This email has been used already. Please try another one.
This email is already logged in.
The length of email can not exceed 50 characters.
This email will be your new login account and it will be unchangeable once you verify it. Proceed to use this email as your login account?
Facebook authorization failed! Please try again later!
Failed to retrieve data, please try again.
Do you want to load from this account which is associated with other game data? Warning: The current game data will be lost.
Game Center authorization failed! Please login from your device Settings.
Request failed, try again later or contact support!
No internet signal, please check your connection and try again.
Internet connection error, please try again later.
The image is larger than [${1}]M. Please try again.
The video you selected is larger than [${1}]M. Please try again.
The video you selected is more than [${1}]s long. Please try again.
Access to certain photos and videos has been authorized.
"You haven't yet given your permission for some functions. Please proceed to \"Settings - Permissions\" to grant access to photos and videos."
This phone number has already been used. Please input another number.
This phone number has been used to login already.
We need your permission to use the sound recording function normally.

"Due to Android system requirements, we'll need your basic permission to access your device in order to generate game accounts or retrieve game accounts. Additionally, we'll need permission to access the storage on your device, so that the game data can function normally."
We need basic access to your device so as to form a unique ID for your account and allow our customer service team to find your lost account quickly.
In order to read game data properly, we need your permission to read and write files on your device.
"No internet connection. Please check your network and tap to reload again."
Password must contain 8-24 characters, including letters and numbers.
Sorry, Crystal purchase service is closed.
Page loading failed, please try again later.
"Album access was denied. This feature can't be used until permission is granted. Go to Settings to grant permission."
Microphone or Bluetooth permission has not been granted. Therefore this feature is unavailable. Please navigate to Settings to enable it.
"The voice message feature may not work properly since you've declined to let us use the microphone. Head over to the settings now?"
"Microphone access was denied. This feature can't be used until permission is granted. Go to Settings to grant permission."
"The voice message feature may not work properly as you've denied our request for permission. Go to Settings now to authorize?"
We need your permission to use your Bluetooth or microphone to connect audio devices for audio calls.
We need your permission to use your microphone to save and send voice messages in our game chat feature.
"Camera access was denied. This feature can't be used until permission is granted. Go to Settings to grant permission."
We cannot take a photo because you denied access to your camera.
We need your permission to access the camera in order to take photos.
"Because you denied our request you won't receive any more notifications from our application."
We request permission to send you notifications.
We need your permission to read and write files on your device to get your account record list.
"We are unable to provide the account record list since you've declined. Head over to the settings now?"
We are unable to open the designated photo. We need your permission to visit your album. Head over to the settings now?
We are unable to save this photo. We need your permission to visit your album. Head over to the settings now?
We are unable to share this photo. We need your permission to visit your album. Head over to the settings now?
We need your permission to visit your album to retrieve the photos you select.
We need your permission to visit your album to save photos.
We need your permission to visit your album to share photos.
"Don't have access to the local photo album.Please allow this in your device settings."
Please allow the game access to the photo album in your settings.
Are you sure? You will not be able to play the game if you do not accept the Agreement.
Please accept the above Agreements to continue the game.
Copied the link to clipboard successfully!
You haven’t installed QQ on your device!
Sorry, your device does not support video recording.
Server error, please try again later.
"Service Unavailable. Please wait for a moment or tap to reload again."
Your session has expired. Please re-login.
Your Security Code must be different from your login password.
You have not installed ${1}. You must install before sharing
Tap here to register or switch accounts!
"The current game account hasn't been bound! Switching accounts will cause you to lose your current game progress! Switch account anyway?"
Connection with Twitter timed out/Invalid token
You haven’t logged in on your Twitter yet, please login in your phone settings.
"You have already deleted your account. If you wish to continue playing, simply register a new one and you're good to go!"
You are currently using a Guest account. Before proceeding, please bind your account.
Password must contain 8-24 characters, including letters and numbers.
Apple login is unable to support the following iOS 13 systems
"You've already registered for a game passport, enter a password to bind it."
You have already registered an account, please enter the login password to bind.
Provide a valid e-mail for binding to ensure your account is kept safe.
Log in to your account to load your game progress and start your journey!
Please contact Customer Service if you need to update your birthday.
Once submitted, you must contact Customer Service to make any modifications. Proceed and submit?
To ensure account security, we recommend that you verify your email address immediately.
Please verify your email first or contact Customer Service.
Failed. To proceed, please install Facebook on your device or select another login method.
Tap here to manage your game passport
Password must contain some upper case letters
Password must contain some lower case letters
Password must contain between 8 to 16 characters.
Set a password, which will be used with your Transfer Account together when you try to transfer your game account.
The Transfer Account password is only valid once.
A Transfer Account allows you to transfer your game data from another device.
The Transfer Account password is only valid once.
Transfer successful. Continue to play on this device.
Use your Transfer Code to transfer your game data on the game interface or in the User Center.
Input your Transfer Account and its password when you try to transfer your game account.
Set a Transfer Account password of 8 to 16 characters
Password must contain 8 to 16 characters, a mix of upper and lower case letters and numbers.
For account security, please generate a Transfer Account for the current visitor account
Transfer Account set. Continue to play on this device.
Never share your Transfer Account with others, otherwise, you may lose your game account.
Transfer Account password set. Please keep your account and password safe.
This email account has already been registered, please use a different account.
This phone number account has already been registered, please use a different account.
Would you like to use your login phone number as your primary contact number?
The WhatsApp account is the same as the phone number.
This account is already registered, please enter the password.
First, please read and agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
I have read and agree to ${1} and ${2}.
Provide a valid e-mail for registration to ensure your account is kept safe.
"Input your phone number to log in or register. We won't share it with anyone else."
A new account is being created.
Reset Security Code via bound Email
Reset Security Code via bound phone number plus verification code
Reset password via bound phone number plus verification code
Your new password must be different from the old password.
Your personal information will be kept strictly confidential and will not be disclosed to any third-party organizations.
To ensure game data security, we strongly suggest you bind your account now.
An account not registered will be created after verification.
"Your email hasn't been verified yet. Please contact Customer Service."
"Your email or phone hasn't been verified or bound. Please contact Customer Service."
This email address has already been verified.
Verification code sent. Input the code to reset.
This account has been restricted from logging in due to potential rule violations.
This account has been deleted and can no longer be used to continue playing.
Only guest login is currently available.
The verification code has been sent to your email. It will be valid for 24 hours.
The verification code will be sent to the email associated with your account.
Enter your Security Code to verify.
Something went wrong, please try again.
Fast, safe, and the choice for millions of users
